21-1216.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Climate Action & Environmental Committee meeting held Tuesday, August 31, 2021.A motion was made by Chair Allen, seconded by Vice Chair Mungo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Zendejas, Mungo and AllenPage 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMTUESDAY, NOVEMBER 16, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHCLIMATE ACTION AND ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITTEE MINUTES2.

The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Zendejas, Mungo and Allen3.

21-1218.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on charge-ready program updates.Oscar Orci, Director of Development Services, spoke; and introduced Brian Bustamante, Senior Advisor, Southern California Edison.Brian Bustamante, Senior Advisor, Southern California Edison, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Allen spoke.Brian Bustamante, Senior Advisor, Southern California Edison, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Allen and Brian Bustamante, Senior Advisor, Southern California Edison.Councilwoman Zendejas spoke.Page 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMTUESDAY, NOVEMBER 16, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHCLIMATE ACTION AND ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITTEE MINUTESBrian Bustamante, Senior Advisor, Southern California Edison, spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.Pete Marsh spoke.A motion was made by Member Zendejas, seconded by Vice Chair Mungo, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Zendejas, Mungo and Allen4.

21-1219.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on the drought’s effect on the City of Long Beach. This Agenda item was laid over by consensus to the nextClimate Action and Environmental Committee meeting.5.

21-1221.summary: Recommendation to request a future presentation on California’s E-Bike Grant Program administered by CARB and what residents may expect.A motion was made by Vice Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Zendejas, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Zendejas, Mungo and Allen6.

21-1222.summary: Recommendation to request a future presentation on various efforts aimed at removing trucks from the I-710, including Pier B on-dock rail, future electrification efforts, and any other relevant efforts or proposed projects identified by staff. A motion was made by Vice Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Zendejas, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Zendejas, Mungo and AllenPage 3 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMTUESDAY, NOVEMBER 16, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHCLIMATE ACTION AND ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITTEE MINUTES7.

21-1223.summary: Recommendation to request a future presentation on the "Reducing Reliance on City Revenue from Oil Production" Memo and the next steps for the City of Long Beach.A motion was made by Vice Chair Mungo, seconded by Member Zendejas, to approve recommendation as amended, for the future presentation on the "Reducing Reliance on City Revenue from Oil Production" Memo to include alternative revenue streams to maintain services.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Zendejas, Mungo and Allen8.
